snippet.title: Asleep - Teaser 2.0 - English
snippet.description:
A new playable DEMO is available on Steam

With great pleasure, sweat, and sleepless nights, we are releasing this BETA version, where Ana Lúcia finally begins her journey through a recurring, yet new nightmare. New challenges await unseen scenarios, as well as mysterious items and characters.

In this version, we also have more content, including some original voices, cutscenes, and more from the soundtrack, we hope you enjoy this new demonstration!

And don't forget to add the game to your wishlist and tell your friends who would love to know about this news.

Available now on Steam: https://bit.ly/AsleepSteam

Stay tuned at http://www.blackhole.games
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/BlackHoleGames_
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/blackholegames
Also on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlackHoleGames
